async fn delete_group(client: &Client, name: &str, force: bool) -> Result<(), Error> {
    client
        .delete_auto_scaling_group()
        .auto_scaling_group_name(name)
        .set_force_delete(force.then(|| true))
        .send()
        .await?;

    println!("Deleted Auto Scaling group");

    Ok(())
}
